name: Disinterment
description:
You are a powerful mage that once caused problems to the kingdom of Rreshi. Now you are disinterred and seeking a way to lift the curse casted on you.

How to play?

Move with WASD, swing your weapon with left mouse button

Hit SPACE key to dash

Cast Soul Capture using Q key, to capture your enemies body

Make sure you cast Soul Capture before you die to fill your health

After you buy spells from the shopkeeper, select them with 1-2-3-4, then right mouse button to cast it

Interact with your surroundings using E key

Don't forget to look for the secrets and the chests throughout the rooms. There are 2 chests and a secret in the rooms

Known bugs

When you  die and restart the game, if you can't press the buttons, please do ALT+TAB and back to game to solve it.
